titleStmt.title: Mvltvm in parvo lately come to town with some reflections upon His Majesties late regulators, or, (as some do call them) the booted apostles : with some other observations, not unworthy (at this present juncture) any true English man's perusal / by T.P. an orthodox and loyal Protestant, though by some nick-named, a latitudinarian trimmer.
titleStmt.author: T. P., Orthodox and loyal Protestant.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
